headline: Constellation Energy (CEG): Is the Clean Power Leader Still Undervalued After Its Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Run?
summary: Constellation Energy (CEG) has quietly turned into one of the market’s stronger utility stories, with the stock gaining about 6% this month and nearly 17% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Constellation Energy. Those gains are not happening in a vacuum, with a year to date share price return north of 50% and a three year total shareholder return above 300% suggesting momentum is still firmly building as investors lean into its clean energy positioning. If Constellation’s run...

headline: Constellation Wins Platts Global Energy Award for Crane Clean Energy Center Restart
summary: BALTIMORE, December 12, 2025--Constellation was awarded "Energy Deal of the Year" at the 2025 Platts Global Energy Awards for its 20-year power purchase agreement with Microsoft.

headline: 2 AI Nuclear Energy Stocks to Buy Now Before they Soar like GEV
summary: GE Vernova's big breakout should have investors looking to buy other best-in-class AI energy stocks before they soar to new highs. The two top AI energy stocks we dive into are Constellation Energy and NextEra Energy.
